article.title: Consistent optical potential for incident and emitted low-energy $α$ particles. II. $α$-emission in fast-neutron induced reactions on Zr isotopes

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of nuclear level densities were used in the analysis?
What was the range of equidistant binning used for the excitation energy grid for both capture and particle-emission analysis?
What percentage changes were made to the level density parameter \'a\' for the 89Y and 90Zr semi-magic nuclei in order to fit the low-lying levels and resonance data?
What is the value of the ratio I/Ir for the nuclear moment of inertia to its rigid-body value for the ground states?
